message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for it. I'm looking for a great deal and would like to propose a price of $90 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $105.
I'm glad you're willing to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $100.
